alert.note: Alert for Clearwater; Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 5:29PM MDT until August 11 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Idaho County in central Idaho... South central Clearwater County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 500 PM PDT. * At 428 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Weippe, or 13 miles northeast of Kamiah, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pierce, Weippe and Musselshell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
